00128         public function boot(&$config) {
00129                 $this->config =& $config;
00130                 $this->logger = new MAIN_Logger();
00131 
00132                 // Startup database
00133                 $dbopts   = $this->config->getOption('database');
00134                 $server   = $dbopts['server'  ];
00135                 $username = $dbopts['username'];
00136                 $password = $dbopts['password'];
00137                 $database = $dbopts['database'];
00138                 $this->database = new DB_Database($server, $username, $password, $database, $this->logger);
00139 
00140                 // Startup cache and session.
00141                 $this->session = new OUT_Session();
00142                 $this->session->startSession();
00143                 $this->cache   = new MAIN_Cache($this->config, $this->session);
00144 
00145                 // Load models.
00146                 $models = $config->getOption('models');
00147                 foreach($models as $name => $value) {
00148                         $options = $value[0];
00149 
00150                         if(is_array($options)) {
00151                                 $protect = in_array("protect", $options);
00152                                 $parent  = in_array("parent",  $options);
00153                         } else {
00154                                 $protect = $parent = false;
00155                         } $this->newDatabaseObject($name, $protect, $parent);
00156                 } return true;
00157         }

00168         public function initiate() {
00169                 // Get action.
00170                 $actions = $this->config->getOption('actions');
00171                 $action  = $this->session->getText('action');
00172                 if(empty($action) && isset($actions['default'])) {
00173                         $action = $actions['default'];
00174                 }
00175 
00176                 // Try getting from the cache first.
00177                 if($this->cache->canBeCached($action) && !$this->cache->cacheExpired()) {
00178                         $this->cached = $this->cache->getCache();
00179                         return true;
00180                 } else {
00181                         // Get classname for action and make new request.
00182                         if(isset($actions[$action])) {
00183                                 $classname = $actions[$action];
00184                         } elseif(isset($actions['error'])) {
00185                                 $classname = $actions['error'];
00186                         } else {
00187                                 return false;
00188                         } $this->request = new $classname($this->config, $this->database, $this->session);
00189 
00190                         // Initiate request.
00191                         return $this->request->initiate($this->session);
00192                 }
00193         }
00194 
00199         public function send() {
00200                 if(!isset($this->request)) {
00201                         return false;
00202                 }
00203 
00204                 $cacheable = $this->cache->canBeCached($this->action);
00205                 $iscached  = empty($this->cached) || !$cacheable;
00206                 $cache     = $this->cached;
00207 
00208                 @ob_end_flush();
00209                 ob_start();
00210                 if(!$cacheable) {
00211                         $this->request->send();
00212                 } elseif(!$iscached) {
00213                         $this->request->send();
00214                         $this->cache->storeCache(ob_get_contents());
00215                 } else {
00216                         echo $this->cached;
00217                 }
00218         }

00226         public function cleanup() {
00227                 global $rootdir;
00228                 $debug = $this->config->getOption('debug');
00229                 if(($res = $this->database->close()) instanceof MAIN_Error) {
00230                         if($debug) {
00231                                 @ob_end_flush();
00232                         } else {
00233                                 @ob_end_clean();
00234                         }
00235                         $this->action = 'error';
00236                         $this->error  = $res;
00237                         return false;
00238                 }
00239 
00240                 $paths = $this->config->getOption('paths');
00241                 $logpath = isset($paths['log']) ? $paths['log'] : "$rootdir/log";
00242                 if(($res = $this->logger->export($logpath)) instanceof MAIN_Error) {
00243                         if($debug) {
00244                                 @ob_end_flush();
00245                         } else {
00246                                 @ob_end_clean();
00247                         }
00248                         $this->action = 'error';

00250                         return false;

00252

00255                                 @ob_end_flush();

00258                         }

00261                         return false;
00262                 }
00263

00284         private function newDatabaseObject($name, $protect = false, $parent = false) {
00285                 $protect = (int) $protect;
00286                 $parent  = (int) $parent;
00287                 $exec = "class $name extends DB_Object {\n" .
00288                         "\tprotected static \$parent = $parent;\n" .
00289                         "\tprotected static \$enableprotect = $protect;\n}";
